misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a certain joie de vivre to the greens. Known for his relaxed demeanor and the ever-present beverage in hand, Martin is a formidable competitor hailing from St. Laurence Golf.

With nine past appearances under his belt, Martin's experience is undeniable. His dedication to the sport has culminated in one Hector Trophée victory, a testament to his skill in pair play. In addition, he has distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player by also claiming the Victor trophy once.

As he gears up for his tenth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Martin remains an active and exciting player to watch. Spectators can anticipate seeing Martin contributing with his usual blend of skill and good cheer.
